Skill.name: Jump
Skill.description: Remove yourself from combat for 1 turn then strike

Skill.name: Elusive Jump
Skill.description: Remove yourself from combat for 2 turns

Skill.name: Doom Spike
Skill.description: Pierce your target and all enemies around them

Skill.name: Helmsplitter
Skill.description: Stab your foe with a chance of paralyzing them

Skill.name: Salamander Roar
Skill.description: Roar dragons flames in a cone

Skill.name: Wind Drive
Skill.description: Spiral into your foe with a powerful whirlwind

Skill.name: Spineshatter Dive
Skill.description: Remove yourself from combat for 1 turn then strike

Skill.name: Chaos Thrust
Skill.description: Follow up to Disembowel and apply a DoT for 3 turns

Skill.name: Dragonfire Dive
Skill.description: Remove yourself from combat for 1 turn then explode wyrm fire on your foes

Skill.name: Soul-Bound
Skill.description: Target non-boss enemy taakes 150% damage until death or end of combat

Skill.name: Blood of the Dragon
Skill.description: Unleash your dragon blood, granting access to your blood abilities for 3 turns

Skill.name: Fang and Claw
Skill.description: Unleash a barrage of slashes and stabs

Skill.name: Wheeling Thrust
Skill.description: Follow up to Fang and Claw

Skill.name: Geirskogul
Skill.description: Unleash a giant thrust on your foe and all enemies behind them

Skill.name: Sonic Thrust
Skill.description: Follow up to Doom Spike

Skill.name: Mighty Leap
Skill.description: Remove yourself from combat for 1 turn then strike

Skill.name: Nastrond
Skill.description: Follow up to Geirskogul

Skill.name: MASTERY - Stardiver
Skill.description: Release all your fury upon your foe, double damage to dragons

Skill.name: MASTERY - Aerial Supremacy
Skill.description: Double all jump damage next jump

Skill.name: MASTERY - Elderwyrms Final Sermon
Skill.description: Become one with the wyrms of old, ignite your soul and unleash the fury of a thousand fallen brethren upon your foe
